scripts.dev: concurrently --names "backend,frontend,openapi" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgYellow.bold" "yarn workspace backend run start:dev" "yarn workspace frontend run dev" "yarn run watch:openapi"
scripts.build: yarn workspace backend run build && yarn workspace frontend run build
scripts.lint: yarn workspace backend run lint && yarn workspace frontend run lint
scripts.lint:fix: yarn workspace backend run lint:fix && yarn workspace frontend run lint:fix
